docs.title: Puzzles and Probability
docs.text:
This site contains short write-ups on probability puzzles, game-theoretic problems, and decision-making under uncertainty.

The focus is on clean reasoning, simple models, and principled solutions.

docs.title: About
docs.text: I work in quantitative research and enjoy solving problems involving probability, inference, and adversarial decision-making.
